content: lion brand pattern # 40599 *ci-cloche pdf* published in knit n style knit it skill level easy level 2 a incredible® article #520 *discontinued* 440 yards b wool-ease® article #620 1 ball crochet hook size k-10 5 crochet hook size h-8 1-1/2 in 4 cm pin back optional sewing needle and matching thread optional gauge 10 single_crochet + 12 row = 4 10 cm with a on larger hook shell single_crochet = 2½ \ 6 5 cm 8 row = 4 \ 10 cm in pattern with a on larger hook special stitches shell picot hat is worked in rounds from the top down shell pattern is worked to finish flower is worked in rounds sew optional pin back to back of flower or sew flower in place as pictured *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
